game.name: Kin and Quarry
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 신성한 영원의 나무를 위한 정수를 회수하기 위해 땅속을 파고드는 점진적 채굴 모험. 채굴하고, 드릴로 뚫고, 폭파하며 가장 깊은 심연에 도달해 희귀한 유물을 발견하고 더 많은 동족을 영입하세요. 파고들기. 강화하기. 반복하기.
game.shortDescriptionEn: An incremental mining adventure where you must dig into the earth to recover essence for your sacred Evertree. Mine, drill, and blast your way to the deepest depths, discovering rare artifacts and recruiting more kin to your cause along the way. Dig. Upgrade. Repeat.
